name: VoThink Us
overview:
Your thoughts, your vote… Express yourself on VoThink.Us, the independent, non-partisan platform responsible for organize worldwide elections, awards, ballots, referendums and express your opinion.

Get your invitation for access to the next open βeta » Designed for everyone, everywhere.

Need more reasons to love VoThink.Us? Look no further. The Innovative Vote

It is time to rethink the way we run elections. It is time for an easy-to-use, online election solution that allows you to execute flawless voting while connecting your membership with your organization. It is time for VoThink.Us

Self-administered online voting software for your organization. Hosted in the cloud, VoThink.Us is designed so that you can quickly create customized electronic elections in a protected online environment. Online debates

The voting public asks the questions and the candidates provide the answers. If you want to set up a debate…

Contact Us » The Greenest elections

VoThink.Us is the most eco-friendly electronic voting system in the world. Using our election software reduces your organization’s carbon footprint as much as possible. Our Green Advantage

That means the carbon footprint used by voters, our servers and the networks in between is measured and effectively neutralized with carbon offsets or renewable energy from wind and solar farms. The Carbon Footprint

Holding an election online is easier on the environment since there is no paper involved. If you can send voting instructions by email instead of the post, the outcome is even better.
